articles.title: Everything Google unveiled at I/O 2025: Gemini, AI Search, smart glasses, more - ZDNET
articles.description: Here's the rundown of every major announcement at the annual developer conference yesterday.

articles.title: Volvo will be the first to install Google’s Gemini in its cars - The Verge
articles.description: Volvo said it would be the first automaker to install Google’s Gemini generative AI in its vehicles.

articles.title: Fortnite returns to the US App Store after a five-year gap - TechCrunch
articles.description: Popular battle royale game Fortnite has finally returned to the U.S. App Store amid game maker Epic Games' lengthy legal skirmish with Apple.

articles.title: Google Unveils Android XR Glasses with Gemini AI Integration - Decrypt
articles.description: Google’s demo of the Android XR showed off features including livestreaming, photo capture, and Google Maps virtual display.

articles.title: AMD Introduces New Radeon Graphics Cards and Ryzen Threadripper Processors at COMPUTEX 2025 - AMD
articles.description: – Radeon RX 9060 XT brings next-gen gaming experiences and FSR 4 ML-powered upscaling to mainstream users –      – Threadripper 9000 Series…...

articles.title: AMD Aims To Kick Rival Intel While It's Down - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: AMD introduced its latest processors for AI-powered personal computers and workstations at the Computex trade show in Taiwan.
